title: Business Analyst
description:
Dear Candidate,

Greetings from TATA Consultancy Services!!

Thank you for expressing your interest in exploring a career possibility with the TCS Family.

Hiring For:-Business Analyst- Banking / Financial Services (IT)

Location: Chennai

Experience: 6 to 10yrs




• 6 – 10 years in Banking / Financial Services (IT)

• Business Knowledge of Core Banking particularly in Deposits and Loans as well as CRM and Financial Accounting.

• The candidate must have in depth knowledge of the business processes of Core banking systems

• Must have working experience with systems for Banking / Financial services in role of business analyst or quality assurance

• Preferably experienced in writing and executing Core Banking related test scenarios/cases
